Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/31st
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 16th, Laramie, Cermak, and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, 16th, Laramie, Cermak, and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/31st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cicero/21st
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Laramie, 16th, Cicero, and Cermak due to street blockage near Cicero/21st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cermak, Laramie, 16th, Cicero, and Cermak, due to street blockage near Cicero/21st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Update: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Cicero
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses rerouted WB: Cermak, Kostner, 16th, Austin, and Cermak; EB: Cermak, Austin, 16th, Cicero, and Cermak due to, street blockage at Cermak/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Update: #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage at Cermak/Cicero.

Westbound buses will operate viaCermak, Kostner, 16th, Austin, and Cermak.

Eastbound buses will operate via Cermak, Austin, 16th, Cicero, and Cermak.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: OrangeLine Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Pulaski

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
